title: Ryze's Ult should be like TK ult and Thresh lantern
body:
Jst had a game when Ryze ult me into the middle of two enemy turrets, forced me to flash away and wasted a ton of time to walk back to safety while he dies...

like seriously this is retarded as fuck. The ult should be changed to id I don't click it I don't get teleported.

replies.body: You can just run out of the circle...
If you're running away that's not always an option. You can't cover the end-to-end distance of the circle before it triggers a lot of the time.
a lot of the time you can't run tho

But then it can't transport an ulting Sion. 

Do you know how rare it is to find an ability that interacts with Sion's ult as it happens, rather than utilizing the after effect?

I'll give you a hint: Nearly nonexistent.
That seems like an awesome troll. Ryze ults you into their supers. HAHAHAHAH
